Body: Possible Duplicate:  How important is it to review the permissions that an app is using?  When I install apps from Android Market (Play Store now) there are some apps that require special permissions and for some of them it's weird to have for example "Read phone call history" when the app is a compass or whatever...Should I be worried? Should I uninstall an app with weird looking permissions?
Title: Should I be worried about applications with weird looking permissions?

history.Text: When I install apps from Android Market (Play Store now) there are some apps that require special permissions and for some of them it's weird to have for example "Read phone call history" when the app is a compass or whatever...Should I be worried? Should I uninstall an app with weird looking permissions?
Should I be worried about applications with weird looking permissions?
